about_the_game:
KuloNiku is a casual cooking game where you prepare your customers' orders to earn tips to upgrade your restaurant. Chop, boil, fry, or broil the ingredients, make sure the food tastes just right, and serve it.

You have inherited your grandma's once-legendary meatball restaurant! Now it's up to you to run the quaint little place, take the townspeople's quirky orders, serve delicious food, and restore its glory.

But it's not as easy as it seems, as there's a rival restaurant in town -- Startstruck Diner, run by the menacing rockstar chef Stella.

                      

From scrumptious meatballs, refreshing crunchy veggies, to a variety of succulent grilled meats, you can cook a variety of ingredients and recipes in KuloNiku.

But why stop there? If you think a dish could use another hit of garlic or a pinch of salt to make it perfect, go for it! You're the chef!

Enjoy the immersive cooking process with our tactile gameplay as you chop, boil, fry, skewer, and much more.

                      

Of course, restaurants need customers. And these townfolks just can't wait to dine at your fine establishment!

Each customer has their unique personality, design, and preferences. Pay close attention to their quirky food orders and figure out what they want. Succesfully serve what they ask for and rake in the tips. 💰

But that's not all. As the story unfolds, some of them might become a friend, a supporter, or perhaps a competitor. Keep your friends close and your customers closer!

                     

Keep things fresh! Improve your restaurant by unlocking new cooking tools and ingredients. Discover new ways to cook and create new offerings for your loyal clientele.

Fancy a bit of personalization? In KuloNiku, you can customize your restaurant and decorate it. Make your restaurant uniquely yours!
detailed_description:
KuloNiku is a casual cooking game where you prepare your customers' orders to earn tips to upgrade your restaurant. Chop, boil, fry, or broil the ingredients, make sure the food tastes just right, and serve it.

You have inherited your grandma's once-legendary meatball restaurant! Now it's up to you to run the quaint little place, take the townspeople's quirky orders, serve delicious food, and restore its glory.

But it's not as easy as it seems, as there's a rival restaurant in town -- Startstruck Diner, run by the menacing rockstar chef Stella.

                      

From scrumptious meatballs, refreshing crunchy veggies, to a variety of succulent grilled meats, you can cook a variety of ingredients and recipes in KuloNiku.

But why stop there? If you think a dish could use another hit of garlic or a pinch of salt to make it perfect, go for it! You're the chef!

Enjoy the immersive cooking process with our tactile gameplay as you chop, boil, fry, skewer, and much more.

                      

Of course, restaurants need customers. And these townfolks just can't wait to dine at your fine establishment!

Each customer has their unique personality, design, and preferences. Pay close attention to their quirky food orders and figure out what they want. Succesfully serve what they ask for and rake in the tips. 💰

But that's not all. As the story unfolds, some of them might become a friend, a supporter, or perhaps a competitor. Keep your friends close and your customers closer!

                     

Keep things fresh! Improve your restaurant by unlocking new cooking tools and ingredients. Discover new ways to cook and create new offerings for your loyal clientele.

Fancy a bit of personalization? In KuloNiku, you can customize your restaurant and decorate it. Make your restaurant uniquely yours!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion
  • Processor: Celeron
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 2000
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Sierra
  • Processor: Intel I3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 8800 gt
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: KuloNiku : Meatball Cooking

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Celeron
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 2000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: General
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel I3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 gt
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: General

short_description: Run a meatball restaurant in this cozy management game. Meet the locals and cook their quirky orders, upgrade and customize your restaurant, follow the charming story, and make your place the best eatery in town!
